001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.object.AmbiguousDateTime;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.DateTimeWithoutTimeZoneItemImpl;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
015
016import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
017import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * An atomic Metapath item representing a date/time value in the Metapath
023 * system.
024 * <p>
025 * This interface provides functionality for handling date/time values with and
026 * without time zone information, supporting parsing, casting, and comparison
027 * operations. It works in conjunction with {@link AmbiguousDateTime} to
028 * properly handle time zone ambiguity.
029 */
030public interface IDateTimeItem extends ITemporalItem {
031  /**
032   * Get the type information for this item.
033   *
034   * @return the type information
035   */
036  @NonNull
037  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IDateTimeItem> type() {
038    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME.getItemType();
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  default IAtomicOrUnionType<? extends IDateTimeItem> getType() {
043    return type();
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided string {@code value}.
048   *
049   * @param value
050   *          a string representing a date/time
051   * @return the new item
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  static IDateTimeItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
055    try {
056      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME.parse(value));
057    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
058      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
059          null,
060          String.format("Invalid date/time value '%s'. %s",
061              value,
062              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
063          ex);
064    }
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided {@code value}.
069   * <p>
070   * This method handles recording if an explicit timezone was provided using the
071   * {@code hasTimeZone} parameter. The {@link AmbiguousDateTime#hasTimeZone()}
072   * method can be called to determine if timezone information is present.
073   *
074   * @param value
075   *          a date/time, without time zone information
076   * @param hasTimeZone
077   *          {@code true} if the date/time is intended to have an associated time
078   *          zone or {@code false} otherwise
079   * @return the new item
080   * @see AmbiguousDateTime for more details on timezone handling
081   */
082  @NonNull
083  static IDateTimeItem valueOf(@NonNull ZonedDateTime value, boolean hasTimeZone) {
084    return hasTimeZone
085        ? IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(value)
086        : valueOf(new AmbiguousDateTime(value, false));
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided {@code value}.
091   * <p>
092   * This method handles recording if an explicit timezone was provided using the
093   * {@link AmbiguousDateTime}. The {@link AmbiguousDateTime#hasTimeZone()} method
094   * can be called to determine if timezone information is present.
095   *
096   * @param value
097   *          a date/time, without time zone information
098   * @return the new item
099   * @see AmbiguousDateTime for more details on timezone handling
100   */
101  @NonNull
102  static IDateTimeItem valueOf(@NonNull AmbiguousDateTime value) {
103    return value.hasTimeZone()
104        ? IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem.valueOf(value.getValue())
105        : new DateTimeWithoutTimeZoneItemImpl(value);
106  }
107
108  /**
109   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
110   *
111   * @param item
112   *          the item to cast
113   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
114   *         cast to this type
115   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
116   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
117   */
118  @NonNull
119  static IDateTimeItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
120    IDateTimeItem retval;
121    if (item instanceof IDateTimeItem) {
122      retval = (IDateTimeItem) item;
123    } else if (item instanceof IDateItem) {
124      IDateItem date = (IDateItem) item;
125      // get the time at midnight
126      ZonedDateTime zdt = ObjectUtils.notNull(date.asZonedDateTime().truncatedTo(ChronoUnit.DAYS));
127      // pass on the timezone ambiguity
128      retval = valueOf(zdt, date.hasTimezone());
129    } else if (item instanceof IStringItem || item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
130      try {
131        retval = valueOf(item.asString());
132      } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
133        // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
134        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
135      }
136    } else {
137      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
138          String.format("unsupported item type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()));
139    }
140    return retval;
141  }
142
143  @Override
144  default IDateTimeItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
145    return cast(item);
146  }
147
148  @Override
149  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
150    return compareTo(cast(item));
151  }
152}
